x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = map(int, input().split())
ladder = abs(x - y) * t1
elevator = abs(x - z) * t2 + 3 * t3 + abs(x - y) * t2
if elevator > ladder:
	print("NO")
else:
	print("YES")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
print("YES" if 3 * t3 + abs(x - z) * t2 + abs(x - y) * t2 <= abs(x - y) * t1 else "NO")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = map(int, input().split())
a = abs(x - y) * t1
b = abs(x - z) * t2 + abs(x - y) * t2 + t3 * 3
if a < b:
    print('NO')
else:
    print('YES')

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
stair = t1 * abs(x - y)
lift = t2 * (abs(z - x) + abs(x - y)) + t3 * 3
print("YES" if lift <= stair else "NO")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
lift = abs(z - x) * t2 + t3 + t3 + abs(x - y) * t2 + t3
stairs = t1 * abs(x - y)
if lift <= stairs:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
d1 = abs(x - y) * t1
d2 = abs(x - z) * t2 + abs(x - y) * t2 + 3 * t3
if d2 <= d1:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))

tp = abs(x - y) * t1
pt = (abs(x - y) + abs(x - z)) * t2 + t3 + t3 + t3
if tp >= pt:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

x,y,z,t1,t2,t3 = map(int, input().split())
stairs = abs(x - y) * t1
lift = abs(z - x) * t2 + t3 + t3 + abs(x - y) * t2 + t3
print('YES' if lift <= stairs else 'NO')

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map( int, input().split() ))
elevator = t2 * ( abs( x - y ) + abs( z - x ) ) + 3 * t3
stairs = t1 * abs( x - y )
if elevator > stairs:
    print( 'NO' )
else:
    print( 'YES' )

x,y,z,t1,t2,t3=list(map(int,input().strip().split()))
T1=abs(y-x)*t2+abs(z-x)*t2+t3*3
T2=abs(y-x)*t1
if (T1<=T2):
	print ("YES")
else:
	print ("NO")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

ld=abs(x-z)*t2 + t3*3 + t2*abs(x-y)
p = t1*abs(x-y)
if ld<=p:
        print("YES")
else:
        print("NO")

x, y, z, t1, t2, t3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
lift = (abs(z - x)*t2 + t3 + t3) + (abs(x - y)*t2 + t3)
st = (abs(x - y) * t1)
if (lift <= st):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

(x,y,z,t1,t2,t3) = map(int, input().split(' '))


diff = abs(x - y)
diffe = abs(z - x)

elevator = diffe * t2 + diff * t2 + 3 * t3
walk = diff * t1

if elevator <= walk:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")
